short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control a spacecraft as it falls toward the surface of the Moon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The objective of this game is for the player to pilot a spacecraft descending toward the surface of the Moon. The player must navigate the ship's horizontal motion and slow its descent to land in the designated area.

Instructions: 
Guide the spacecraft to land at the bottom of the screen. Maintain a slow and steady speed and avoid touching down at a speed greater than 12 MPH or tilting the ship more than 11 degrees.

Controls: 
Up arrow 
Left arrow 
Right arrow 
Combination of Up and Left or Up and Right arrows

Acknowledgment:
This game is based on the https://github.com/ehmorris/lunar-lander repository.
